sentences.en: Add sugar and glutinous rice flour to form dough.
sentences.cn: 加入砂糖及糯米粉搓成粉团.

sentences.en: I bought two bowls of glutinous millet paste at the temple fair.
sentences.cn: 在庙会上,我买了两碗茶汤.

sentences.en: Joan selected quality glutinous rice soaked and cooked dry cooking.
sentences.cn: 选用优质糯米浸透琼干炊熟.

sentences.en: Just add in some water if glutinous rice too dry.
sentences.cn: 若糯米太干可加入少许水拌炒.

sentences.en: May: Grilled corn, glutinous dumplings, fried peanuts, and bean curd jelly.
sentences.cn: 阿美: 烤玉米 、 汤圆 、 炸花生和豆腐脑.

sentences.en: Our company is one of the leading manufacturers of glutinous rice sausage.
sentences.cn: 本公司专心致力于供应糯米肠.

sentences.en: Pathologically, the non - enhanced areas were mucus, pus, or glutinous fluid.
sentences.cn: 无强化区的病理成分为粘液 、 脓液或胶样液体.

sentences.en: Rinse the glutinous rice and soak the water for 4 hours.
sentences.cn: 糯米洗净,用水浸约4小时至胀软.

sentences.en: Source for Gramineae rice ( glutinous rice ) of the kernel.
sentences.cn: 为禾本科植物稻 ( 糯稻 ) 的种仁.

sentences.en: The coat covering the soft candies is made from glutinous rice.
sentences.cn: 包裹软糖的江米纸是由糯米做成的.

sentences.en: The dumplings we eat Lantern Festival are made from glutinous rice.
sentences.cn: 我们元宵节吃的汤圆是用糯米做的.

sentences.en: The meat was chewy and the sauce was glutinous and tasted artificial.
sentences.cn: 肉嚼不烂，酱汁黏稠，味道也不自然。

sentences.en: The milk - clotting mechanism of glutinous rice wine was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了江米酒制作米酒奶的凝乳机理.

sentences.en: The product , glutinous, taste sweet and has thin peel, but without residue.
sentences.cn: 本产品色泽纯正,洁白如玉, 粘甜爽口,皮薄无渣.

sentences.en: The sauce was glutinous and tasted artificial.
sentences.cn: 这种酱有些黏，尝起来不是非常地道。
